Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.model

Class ProductionChain

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.model.ProductionChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Copyable<ProductionChain>, EventSource, Timed, Visitable
public class ProductionChain extends Object implements Visitable, EventSource, Copyable<ProductionChain>, Timed
Represents a production chain. Both actual and a blueprint(prototype).
